extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for performing operations on Swing components and DialogComponents

    1.28.0
    Author:
    S.Roughley knime@vernalis.com

      static void keepHeightFillWidth(javax.swing.JComponent comp)
      Method to force a Swing JComponent to retain it's height but fill the available width, by setting the minimum size to the preferred size, and the maximum size height to the preferred width + 2000 pixels

      Method to force a Swing JComponent to retain it's width but fill the available height, by setting the minimum size to the preferred size, and the maximum size height to the preferred height + 2000 pixels
